Description.Text: Cally Palace is a family-friendly 4-star hotel offering traditional accommodation near the heart of Gatehouse of Fleet. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, tennis court, award-winning restaurant, stunning interiors and golf course. Gatehouse of Fleet is a small town in Kirkcudbrightshire once known for its cotton mills. Regional places of interest include Cardoness Castle, Anwoth, the old Portpatrick and Wigtownshire Joint Railway and Galloway Forest Park. Local bus services provide access to other popular regional destinations. The hotel occupies a grand mid-rise property completed in 1763 and set amongst 600 acres of park and woodland. Its beautiful interiors boast huge marble pillars and a gilt cupola ceiling. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, tennis court, 18-hole golf course, putting green, snooker room, sauna, gym and croquet lawn. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are spacious and decorated in a traditional, individual style with charming circular windows. Amenities include a satellite TV, tea and coffee equipment and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower or bathtub. The award-winning fine-dining restaurant offers classic Scottish cuisine, using fresh and seasonal ingredients, in an elegant and sophisticated setting, while guests can enjoy a range of cocktails and snacks in the stylish hotel bar, which features a conservatory. Free parking is possible onsite.
